description: Hearty comfort food that satisfies. All entrees come with your choice of two sides.

items.name: Homemade Meatloaf
items.description: Our famous recipe made with ground beef and pork, topped with tangy tomato glaze

items.name: Country Fried Chicken
items.description: Half chicken, hand-breaded and fried to golden perfection

items.name: Chicken Fried Steak
items.description: Tenderized beef cutlet, breaded and fried, topped with creamy pepper gravy

items.name: Sunday Pot Roast
items.description: Slow-cooked beef roast with carrots, potatoes, and onions in rich brown gravy

items.name: Grilled Atlantic Salmon
items.description: Fresh salmon fillet grilled with lemon butter and herbs

items.name: Chicken & Dumplings
items.description: Tender chicken and fluffy dumplings in savory broth with vegetables

items.name: Liver & Onions
items.description: Pan-fried beef liver topped with caramelized onions and bacon

items.name: BLT Sandwich
items.description: Crispy bacon, fresh lettuce, ripe tomatoes, and mayo on toasted white bread

items.name: Turkey Club
items.description: Triple-decker with turkey, bacon, lettuce, tomato, and mayo

items.name: Classic Hamburger
items.description: Half-pound beef patty with lettuce, tomato, onion, and pickles

items.name: Chef Salad
items.description: Mixed greens with ham, turkey, cheese, hard-boiled egg, and vegetables

items.name: Soup & Salad Combo
items.description: Cup of today's soup with a house salad
